title: Malaysia Five-Star Paradise with Beachfront Infinity Pool
description: Discover a five-star oceanfront paradise with a stay at the luxurious Anantara Desaru Coast Resort & Villas - an oasis amid lush tropical gardens, lagoons and golden Malaysian beaches. Experience opulent days relaxing by the beachfront infinity pool, before retreating to the Lagoon Pool Bar for a cocktail to watch the sun set over the turquoise waters. Indulge in a variety of dining experiences at the two onsite restaurants or organise an intimate beachside bespoke meal for two under the stars.
offer_address: Persiaran Pantai, Desaru Coast, 81930 Bandar Penawar, Johor, Malaysia
